@id.title: Handle
@id.description: The unique identifier of the Taxonomic Expert

@type.title: Object Type
@type.description: The type of the object, in this case TaxonomicExpert

schema:dateCreated.title: Date Created
schema:dateCreated.description: The date on which the Taxonomic Expert was created or the item was added to a DataFeed

schema:dateModified.title: Date Modified
schema:dateModified.description: The date on which the Taxonomic Expert was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed

schema:datePublished.title: Date Modified
schema:datePublished.description: Date of the expert was published, following the ISO Date Time Format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX

schema:age.title: Age
schema:age.description: Age category of the taxonomist. This data will be shown anonymously for trend analysis.

schema:gender.title: Gender
schema:gender.description: Gender category of the taxonomist. This data will be shown anonymously for trend analysis.
